The Tradx Fellowship Program 2024

Official Report

Ref. No.: FR2024/TRADX/10/09

Date: 15/09/2024

Important Notice

To all participant traders:

The exam was originally scheduled for 05/09/2024 and was rescheduled to 10/09/2024. The exam was held from 10 AM to 3 PM, and the results were published the same day at 6:30 PM (IST). The list of provisionally selected traders was published at 9:30 PM (IST).

Results Matrix of the Interview

Sl. No. Name CAT Confidence Level Active Skills Trading Skills Overall Grade

Grades Overview

  • A: Excellent – Outstanding performance
  • B: Good – Strong proficiency
  • C: Satisfactory – Average competence
  • D: Below Average – Requires improvement
  • E: Poor – Fails to meet expectations
  • -1: Absent – No assessment

Category Descriptions (CAT)

  • S: Student – Currently pursuing education and acquiring skills relevant to their field.
  • J: Employed Professional – Actively employed and applying their skills in a professional job.
  • SX: International Student – A student from a foreign country, pursuing education and skill development.
  • JX: International Professional – A foreign national currently employed in a professional setting, applying their skills in the workforce.

Participant Traders' Individual Performance Feedback

For your convenience, you can download the detailed performance feedback as a PDF:

Download Feedback PDF

Selection for The Tradx Funded Next Program

We are pleased to announce that all participants who have achieved an Overall Grade of A are eligible for the next phase of training and funding.

For participants with Active Skill grades of A or B who did not qualify, we encourage you to submit the common registration form for future opportunities at SAHEDX TECHNOLOGIES & SAHXD INCORPORATION LTD.

Executive | Mr. SAHED ALI

The Tradx Funds Management

Place: Kalyani, Date: 15/09/2024
